title: Tell us what you think! Res Lease in Austin. 1 Beds, 1 Baths
posting_body: You must see this condo with 1 bed 1 and half bathroom in recently built EastGate Condominiums in Austin, TX!!
Conveniently located in a walking distance to the University of Texas.
With a multi-level open floorplan, this home welcomes you to a luminous living space with a street view balcony.

Exquisitely designed kitchen with U-shaped layout, fully equipped with stainless appliances, a fridge, electric range, microwave, and dishwasher, along with an oversized counter bar to host dinners with your loved ones.
Primary bedroom with walk-in closet, a full bathroom with dual vanity, useful cabinets and a gorgeous metro tiled bathub perfect to relax.
There's also a laundry closet with washer and dryer units included and a terrace with an amazing view of the cityscape.
Amenities included in this complex are the awesome pool on the first floor to cool down during the hot Texas summer and the common deck area.
Your lease includes one assigned parking spot.
Do not wait any longer, tour and apply today!!
In person tours required (No exceptions)
All renters are enrolled in the resident benefits package.
--to set up a viewing--
